name: DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.onmessageerror
description: The onmessageerror event handler of the DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope interface is an EventListener, called whenever an MessageEvent of type messageerror is fired on the worker—that is, when it receives a message that cannot be deserialized.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'onmessageerror' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
